text.text: har ehtimolga qarshi, ehtiyot shart, hisobga olib

text:
degan ma'nolarda qoʻllanuvchi bog'lovchi hisoblanadi.
🔸I'll give you my address
you need my help in the future.

text.text: (Men sizga uy manzilimni beraman har ehtimolga qarshi sizga mening yordamim kerak bo'lib qolsa)

text: bog'lovchisi oʻzidan oldingi fikrga zid fikr bildirish uchun qoʻllaniladi. Oʻzbek tiliga

deb tarjima qilinadi.
🔸The test was difficult

degan ma'noda bog'lovchi sifatida qoʻllanila oladi. Bu holat koʻpincha rasmiy va badiiy uslubda uchraydi.
🔸I believed him
I knew that he was an honest man.

text.text: (Men unga ishondim, chunki men uni halol inson deb bilardim)

text:
soʻzi ham bog'lovchi sifatida qoʻllana oladi.
🔸
it was getting dark, we decided to stop.

text.text: (Qorong'u tushayotganligi tufayli, biz to'xtashga qaror qildik)

text: anyone should doubt my story, I have brought documents to attest to its truth.

text.text: (Mening gaplarimga kimdir shubha bildirmasligi uchun men uning haqiqat ekanligini isbotlovchi hujjatlarni olib keldim)

text: bog'lovchisi oldingi fikrga zid fikr bildirish uchun

degan ma'noda qoʻllaniladi.
🔸We thought the figures were correct.

we have now discovered some errors.
🔸Your test results are very high.

your written work is very bad.

⚠️however bog’lovchisi oʻzidan keyin

degan ma’noda qoʻllaniladi.
🔸She has the windows open,
I explained, she still didn’t understand.

text.text: (Qanchalik ehtiyotkorona tushuntirsam ham u baribir tushunmadi)

text:
degan ma'nolarda shart bog'lovchisi sifatida qoʻllaniladi.
🔸

she studies hard, she will pass the exam.

8️⃣

ma'nolarida shart bog'lovchisi sifatida qoʻllaniladi.
🔸You can take my car

you are wrong, what will you do then?

🔟

degan ma'noda shart ergash gaplarni bog'lashda ishlatiladi.
🔸
hard, she will fail the exam.

text.text: Ingliz-tilidagi 15 ta eng mashhur sleng  qisqartmalar
1. Ain't = Am not/are not/is not - emas

text: E.g. I ain't sure - ishonchim komil emas
E.g. He ain't finished yet - u tugatmagan hali
E.g. I wanna go home. - men uyga ketishni xohlayman
E.g. I wanna coffee. - xohlayman bitta kofe

text.text: 5. Whatcha = What are you - sen nima

text: E.g. Whatcha gonna do? - sen nima qilmoqchisan?
E.g. What kinda movie is that? - U qanaqa kino
E.g. I’m sorta tired - men sal charchadim
E.g. Get outta here - bu yerdan tashqariga chiq
E.g. I eat alotta cake. - men ko'p to'rt yeyman
E.g. I have lotsa money - menda ko'p pul bor
E.g. Much of  was wasted - vaqtning ko'pi bekor ketdi
E.g. Would you like a cuppa coffee? - bir chashka kofe xohlaysizmi?
E.g. Lemme see! - ruhsatingi bilan ko'raychi
E.g. Gimme the pen! - ruchkani menga ber

text:
used when encouraging someone to respond to a request without delay.
💥

" is used for parties where guests are expected to bring their own beverages or restaurants that don't sell alcohol.
💥

," which means creating something on your own. It is used for crafts and home repairs.
💥

," and is used as a guess for when one expects to arrive somewhere.
💥

" French for "respond, please." It's often used on invitations to parties and special events, and is intended (as it says) to be responded to with a "yes, we will attend," or "no, we will not."

✅

💥 tsp or t - teaspoon/teaspoons
💥 tbs, tbsp or T - tablespoon/tablespoons
💥 c - cup/cups
💥 gal - gallon
💥 lb - pound/pounds
💥 pt - pint
💥 qt - quart

✅

text.text: If you want to find your way around, you better know location abbreviations such as:

text:
💥 Ave - avenue
💥 Blvd - boulevard
💥 Cyn - Canyon
💥 Ln - lane
💥 Rd - road
💥 St - street

✅

text.text: Abbreviations often show up in describing academic and job titles.

text:
For example:
💥 BA - Bachelor of Arts
💥 BS - Bachelor of Science
💥 MA - Master of Arts
💥 M.PHIL or MPHIL - Master of Philosophy
💥 JD - Juris Doctor
💥 DC - Doctor of Chiropractic
💥 PA - Personal Assistant
💥 MD - Managing Director
💥 VP - Vice President
💥 VP - Senior Vice President
💥 EVP - Executive Vice President
💥 CMO - Chief Marketing Officer
💥 CFO - Chief Financial Officer
💥 CEO - Chief Executive Officer

text.text:
​​​​🎼 ​​"Back To You"
🎤 Selena Gomez

"Back To You"
(from "13 Reasons Why" soundtrack)

Took you like a shot
Thought that I could chase you with the cold evening
Let a couple years water down how I'm feeling about you (feeling about you)
And every time we talk
Every single word builds up to this moment
And I gotta convince myself I don't want it, even though I do (even though I do)

You could break my heart in two
But when it heals, it beats for you
I know it's forward but it's true
I wanna hold you when I'm not supposed to
When I'm lying close to someone else
You're stuck in my head and I can't get you out of it
If I could do it all again
I know I'd go back to you
I know I'd go back to you
I know I'd go back to you

I never got it right
Playing and re-playing old conversations
Overthinking every word and I hate it
'Cause it's not me ('Cause it's not me)
And what's the point in hiding
And everybody knows that we got unfinished business
And I regret it if I didn't say this isn't what it could be (isn't what it could be)

You could break my heart in two
But when it heals, it beats for you
I know it's forward but it's true
I wanna hold you when I'm not supposed to
When I'm lying close to someone else
You're stuck in my head and I can't get you out of it
If I could do it all again
I know I'd go back to you
I know I'd go back to you
I know I'd go back to you
I go back to you
I go back to you
I know I said I wasn't sure
But I go back to you
I know I'd go back to you

You could break my heart in two
But when it heals, it beats for you
I know it's forward but it's true
Won't lie, I'd go back to you
You know, my thoughts are running loose
It's just a thing you make me do
And I could fight, but what's the use
I know I'd go back to you

I wanna hold you when I'm not supposed to
When I'm lying close to someone else
You're stuck in my head and I can't get you out of it
If I could do it all again
I know I'd go back to you
I'll go back to you
I'll go back to you
I know I'd go back to you
(Go back to you, go back to you)
(Go back to you, go back to you)
(Go back to you, go back to you)

messages.from: Online English lessons and Japanese language
messages.author: Temur(태 무 리)
text:
I suppose - я полагаю, считаю, думаю 
I suppose it will rain today. (Думаю, что сегодня пойдет дождь). 

I reckon - я считаю, полагаю 
I reckon she is angry at me for leaving her alone. (Полагаю, она на меня зла из-за то, что я бросил ее одну). 

I guess - я думаю, полагаю, наверно 
I guess I'll go now. (Я, наверно, пойду). 

I imagine - я думаю, полагаю 
I imagine she earned a lot of money with her new novel. (Полагаю, она заработала много денег на своем новом романе). 

I presume - полагаю, предполагаю 
That's the new assistant, I presume. (Это тот самый новый ассистент, я полагаю). 

In my opinion - по моему мнению 
In my opinion this matter is not as bad as it may seem. (По моему мнению, все не так плохо, как кажется). 

I believe - полагаю, считаю 
I believe he is innocent. (Считаю, что он невиновен). 

It seems to me that - мне кажется, что. 
It seems to me that they are conspiring against us. (Мне кажется, что они то-то замышляют против нас). 

To my way of thinking - на мой взгляд, по-моему 
To my way of thinking, his speech was not very convincing. (На мой взгляд, его речь была не очень убедительна). 

As I see it - по моему мнению, как мне кажется 
As I see it, he has done nothing wrong but helped his family. (По моему мнению, он не сделал ничего плохого, только помогал своей семье). 

The way I see things is that - как я это вижу, по-моему 
The way I see things is that they have committed a crime and have to be punished. (Как я это вижу, они совершили преступление, и должны быть наказаны).

text:
KO'P NARSANI TUSHINISHGA YORDAM BERUVCHI PSIXOLOGIK DALILLAR:

1. 👬 16 dan 28 yoshgacha bo'lgan oraliqda vujudga kelgan do'stlik odatda eng mustaxkam va davomiy bo'ladi.

2. 😍 Ayollarni, past hirildoq ovozga ega erkaklar o'ziga rom etadi, sababi ular o'ziga ishongan va bosiq (agressiv emasdek) bo'lib tuyiladi.

3. 😓 Hayotda ko'p qiyinchilik ko'rgan insonlar, odatda yaxshi maslaxatlar berishadi.

4. 🎓 Inson intellekti qanchalik yuqori bo'lsa, u shunchalik tez o'ylaydi va husnixati tushinarsiz bo'ladi.

5. 👫 Birinchi uchrashuvda notanish insonning aslida qanday odam ekanini, uning ofitsant (xizmatchi)ga bo'lgan munosabati, muomilasi orqali bilib olishingiz mumkin.

6. 😔 Aybdorlik hissi yaxshi rivojlangan insonlar, boshqalarning his-tuyg'ularini yaxshi farqlashadi.

7. 👤 Kam muloqot qiluvchi insonlar shunday mahoratga egaki - o'zlari haqida kam so'zlashsada, lekin siz uni huddi yaqindan bilib olgandek tasurotni uyg'otishga ustadirlar.

8. 😷 Ayollarda og'riq retseptorlari erkaklarga nisbatan ikki marotaba ko'proq va og'riqga chiqamlilik ikki martta yuqoriroqdir.

9.🎵 Musiqani yuqori chastotalarda tinglaganimizda, o'zimizni ancha hotirjam, baxtli va tinchlangandek his qilamiz.

10. 💭 Agar tunda fikr-hayollaringiz uyqu bermasa, ularni bir varoq qog'ozga yozing. Bundan boshingiz ancha tiniqlashadi va sizni uyquga tortishni boshlaydi.

11. 📩 Hayrli tong va hayrli tun, shirin tushlar ko'ring deb bildirilgan tilak smslar, miyadagi baxt hissiga javob beruvchi qismni faollashtiradi.

Bizdan uzoqlashmang😘

🔹WTF –  what the fuck 
🔹LOL – laughing out loud

text.text: 30 кишилик тўйларга рухсат берилганидан сўнг Қашқадарё вилоятида нечта никоҳ қайд этилди?

text: Республика махсус комиссиясининг қарорига асосан 1 июньдан бошлаб “яшил”  тоифадаги ҳудудларда 30 кишидан ошмаган ҳолда тўйларни ўтказишга рухсат

Буни қарангки,  турли жарима-ю қарорлар била ҳам тўйларни ихчамлаштиришга қаратилган ҳаракатлар ҳам, короновирус сингари одамларга таъсир эта олмади.

Тантанада нечта меҳмон қатнашгани-ю, дастурхони қандай бўлгани, қайси санъаткорни чақирилганлиги мутлақо аҳамиятсиз эканлиги, энг муҳими ва асосийси бу икки ёшнинг бахтли бўлиши, ўзаро келишиб, тушуниб, англаб турмуш қуриши муҳим эканлигини пандемия туфайли кўпчилик англаб етди шекилли.

Тўйларга рухсат берилгандан сўнг, баъзилар ортга сурган билан, чўзган билан фойда бўлмаслигини ҳис этиб, тўйларни оила даврасида, ихчамгина тарзда ўтказишни бошлашди.

text.text: Қашқадарё вилоятидаги туман ва шаҳар  ФҲДЁ бўлимлари томонидан  июнь ойида жами бўлиб 2350 та никоҳ расман қайд этилган бўлиб, қайдларнинг 892 таси ойнинг биринчи ярмига тўғри келмоқда. Иккинчи ярмида эса, яъни 16-30 июнь кунлари 1458 та никоҳ қайд этилган.

text:
Эътибор қилдингизми, ойнинг иккинчи ярмида салкам икки баробарга кўпайганига? 

Бу ҳали ҳаммаси эмас. Статистик маълумотларни ўрганар эканмиз, халқимиз иримчи эканми деган хаёл ҳам пайдо бўлди.

text.text: Дунё халқлари 13 рақамини бахтсизлик келтиради деб ҳисоблашишларини эшитганмиз, ўқиганмиз. Буни қарангки, ўзимизда ҳам шундай ўйлайдиганлар йўқ эмас экан. Тасодифми ёки атайин, аммо 13 июнь куни фақатгина 1 та никоҳ қайд этилган. Вилоятимиз миқёсида ўтган ойда энг кўп никоҳ қайд этилган сана бу 29 июнь, шу куни 202 та жуфтликнинг никоҳи қайд этилган.

text:
Туманлар кесимида қарайдиган бўлсак, июнь ойида энг кўп никоҳдан ўтганлар Қарши туманида -296 нафар, Ғузор туманида – 281 нафар, Қамаши туманида – 238 нафар ва Косон туманида 225 нафар жуфтликлар ўз муносабатларини қонунийлаштирган. 

Кўпроқ хабарлар👇

text: 🔁 Кеча, 1 июлдан бошлаб, Олий ва ўрта махсус таълим вазирлиги томонидан

- магистратурага ўқишга қабул бўйича ҳужжат топширишнинг веб-платформаси ишга туширилиб, абитуриентлар учун катта имконият яратилган эди. 

📊 Платформада ҳар бир олий таълим муассасаси бўйича мутахассисликлар кесимида абитуриентлардан тушган
ни кўриш учун, дастурга кириб, тегишли таълим тили ва олий таълим муассасасини танлаш лозим бўлади.

text.text: - Олий таълим ислоҳотлари: олий таълим тизимидаги энг сўнгги янгилик ва хабарлар, фойдали маълумотлар:

ushbu OTMni Bosh vazirning 4 o‘rinbosari, 2 vazir va 6 viloyat hokimlari tamomlagan
(4 vazir, Qonunchilik palatasi Spikerining 3 o‘rinbosari, 2 viloyat hokimlari
Senat Raisi va Oliy Majlis Qonunchilik palatasi Spikeri, Senat Raisi hamda Qonunchilik palatasi Spikerining birinchi o‘rinbosarlari, Bosh vazir maslahatchisi, Bosh prokuror va 2 vazir

text:
rezyumesida biryo‘la 3 ta diplomga egaligi haqida ma’lumot bor.

text: Garvard universitetini, Xalq ta’limi vaziri Sherzod Shermatov esa Yel universitetini tamomlagan.

text.text:
Университетнинг янги филиалига хужжатлар қабул қилиш бошланди

Тошкент давлат юридик университетининг Ихтисослаштирилган филиали

text: Тошкент шаҳри ва Тошкент вилояти абитуриентларини
ҳужжат топширишга таклиф этади. Бу ҳақда Адлия вазирлигининг "Ҳуқуқий ахборот" канали

.

 ⚖️ Филиал Тошкент шаҳри ва Тошкент вилоятида ҳуқуқбузарликлар профилактикаси ва жамоат хавфсизлигини таъминлаш соҳасида

text.text: Ички ишлар вазирлиги ва Миллий гвардия тизимига замонавий ва юқори малакали юридик кадрлар тайёрлаш мақсадида

text:
.

💼 Филиалда “Ҳуқуқбузарликлар профилактикаси ва жамоат хавфсизлигини таъминлаш” мутахассислиги бўйича

text.text: Эслатиб ўтамиз, Филиал дипломи ички ишлар органларига Ички ишлар вазирлиги Академиясида махсус касбий тайёргарликни ўтмасдан, “лейтенант” махсус унвони берилган ҳолда хизматга қабул қилиш учун асос бўлади.

text:
✅ Филиалнинг ижтимоий тармоқлардаги саҳифалари:
👉 Телеграм канали:
| Абитуриент ахборот хизматининг телеграм каналига уланиш учун 👇👇👇

text:
✅Writing time
Some useful phrases 🇬🇧 🇺🇿
📝 Fikrlarni birma bir ifodlash uchun:

🔸 In the first place – Birinchi o’rinda
🔸 To start/begin with – Boshlashga/Boshlanishiga  
🔸 Firstly - Birinchidan
🔸 Secondly – Ikkinchidan
🔸 Thirdly - Uchinchidan
🔸 Finally – Nihoyat
🔸 In addition (to this) – Qo’shimchasiga
🔸 Furthermore – Qo’shimcha qilib
🔸 Moreover – Qo’shimchasiga
🔸 Besides – Bundan tashqari

📝 Foydali tamonlarini sanab o’tganda:

🔸 The main/ first/ most important advantage of … -  Biror narsaning asosiy/ ilk/ eng muhim foydasi …
🔸 One/Another/ An additional advantage of … - Biror narsaning bir/ boshqa/ qo’shimcha foydasi …

📝 Zararli tamonlarini sanab o’tganda:

🔸 The main/most important disadvantage / drawback of … - Biror narsaning asosiy/eng muhim ziyoni … 
🔸 One/Another/An additional disadvantage of … Biror narsaning birinchi/boshqa/qo’shimcha ziyoni …
🔸 Some/Many people are against … - Ba’zi/Ko’p odamlar … ga qarshi.

📝 Natija va sabablarni misol keltirganda:

🔸 For example/instance / such as / like – Misol uchun
🔸 Therefore – shuning uchun 
🔸 For this reason – shu sababli
🔸 because/ as/ since - sababli
🔸 as a result - natijasida

📝 Qarama qarshilikni ko’rsatganda:

🔸 On the other hand – Boshqa tamondan
🔸 However - Biroq
🔸 still - hanuz
🔸 but - lekin
🔸 nonetheless - ammo 
🔸 nevertheless  - ammo
🔸 Although - … ga qaramay
🔸 Even though - … ga qaramay (kuchliroq)
🔸 despite – biror narsaga qaramasdan
🔸 in spite of (the fact that) – biror narsaga qaramasdan

📝 Xulosalash uchun ishlatilinadigan iboralar:

🔸 In conclusion - xulosa qilib
🔸 To conclude - xulosalab
🔸 Sum up – xulosa qilib
🔸 All in all – xulosa tarzida
🔸 Finally - nihoyat
🔸 Lastly – so’ngida
🔸 Taking everything into account – Barchasini e’tiborga olgan holda

📮Join and share! 👇🏻

text.text:
Ingliz tilini qo'shiqlarda o'rganing
🔘 P. Diddy and Dirty Money ft. Skylar Grey – I'm Coming Home

text:
I'm coming home
I'm coming home
Tell the world I'm coming home
Let the rain wash away all the pain of yesterday
I know my kingdom awaits and they've forgiven my mistakes
I'm coming home, I'm coming home
Tell the world that I'm coming

I'm back where I belong,
Yeah I never felt so strong
(I'm back baby)
I feel like there's nothing that I can't try
And if you with me put your hands high
(put your hands high)

If you ever lost a light before,
This ones for you
And you, the dreams are for you

I hear "The Tears of a Clown"
I hate that song
I always feel like they talking to me when it comes on
Another day another Dawn
Another Keisha, nice to meet ya, get the math I'm gone
What am I 'posed to do when the club lights come on
Its easy to be Puff, but its harder to be Sean
What if the twins ask me why I ain't marry their mom (why, damn!)
How do I respond?
What if my son stares with a face like my own
And says he wants to be like me when he's grown
Shit! But I ain't finished growing
Another night the inevitable prolongs
Another day another dawn
Just tell Keisha and Taneisha I'll be back in the morn'
Another lie that I carry on
I need to get back to the place I belong

I'm coming home
I'm coming home
Tell the world that I'm coming home
Let the rain wash away all the pain from yesterday
I know my kingdom awaits and they've forgiven my mistakes
I'm coming home, I'm coming home
Tell the world that I'm coming, home

"A House is Not A Home", I hate this song
Is a house really a home when your loved ones are gone (no)
And niggas got the nerve to blame you for it
And you know you woulda took the bullet if you saw it
But you felt it and still feel it
And money can't make up for it or conceal it
But you deal with it and you keep ballin'
Pour out some liquor, play ball and we keep ballin'
Baby we've been living in sin 'cause we've been really in love
But we've been living as friends
So you've been a guest in your own home
It's time to make your house your own
Pick up your phone, come on

I'm coming home
I'm coming home
Tell the world that I'm coming home
Let the rain wash away all the pain from yesterday
I know my kingdom awaits and they've forgiven my mistakes
I'm coming home, I'm coming home
Tell the world that I'm coming, home

"Ain't No Stopping Us Now", I love that song
Whenever it comes on it makes me feel strong
I thought I told y'all that we won't stop
'Til we back cruising through Harlem, these old blocks
Is what made me, saved me, drove me crazy
Drove me away than embraced me
Forgave me for all of my shortcomings
Welcome to my homecoming
Yeah it's been a long time coming
Lot of fights, lot of scars, lot of bottles
Lot of cars, lot of ups, lot of downs
Made it back, lost my dog (I miss you big)
And here I stand, a better man! (a better man)
Thank you Lord (Thank you Lord)
Thank you all!

I'm coming home
I'm coming home
Tell the world that I'm coming home
Let the rain wash away all the pain from yesterday
I know my kingdom awaits and they've forgiven my mistakes
I'm coming home, I'm coming home
Tell the world that I'm coming, home

💮

text.text:
​He deals the cards as a meditation
And those he plays never suspect
He doesn't play for the money he wins
He don't play for respect

He deals the cards to find the answer
The sacred geometry of chance
The hidden law of a probable outcome
The numbers lead a dance

I know that the spades are the swords of a soldier
I know that the clubs are weapons of war
I know that diamonds mean money for this art
But that's not the shape of my heart

He may play the jack of diamonds
He may lay the queen of spades
He may conceal a king in his hand
While the memory of it fades

I know that the spades are the swords of a soldier
I know that the clubs are weapons of war
I know that diamonds mean money for this art
But that's not the shape of my heart
That's not the shape
The shape of my heart

If I told her that I loved you
You'd maybe think there's something wrong
I'm not a man of too many faces
The mask I wear is one

But those who speak know nothing
And find out to their cost
Like those who curse their luck in too many places
And those who fear are lost

I know that the spades are the swords of a soldier
I know that the clubs are weapons of war
I know that diamonds mean money for this art
But that's not the shape of my heart
That's not the shape of my heart
That's not the shape
The shape of my heart

text.text:
​​​​🎼 "Who Says"
🎤 Selena Gomez

I wouldn't wanna be anybody else, hey

You made me insecure,
Told me I wasn't good enough.
But who are you to judge
When you're a diamond in the rough?
I'm sure you got some things
You'd like to change about yourself.
But when it comes to me
I wouldn't want to be anybody else.

Na na na na na na na na na na na na na
Na na na na na na na na na na na na na

I'm no beauty queen
I'm just beautiful me

Na na na na na na na na na na na na na
Na na na na na na na na na na na na na

You've got every right
To a beautiful life
C'mon

Who says, who says you're not perfect?
Who says you're not worth it?
Who says you're the only one that's hurtin'?
Trust me, that's the price of beauty
Who says you're not pretty?
Who says you're not beautiful?
Who says?

It's such a funny thing
How nothing's funny when it's you
You tell 'em what you mean
But they keep whiting out the truth
It's like a work of art
That never gets to see the light
Keep you beneath the stars
Won't let you touch the sky

Na na na na na na na na na na na na na
Na na na na na na na na na na na na na

I'm no beauty queen
I'm just beautiful me

Na na na na na na na na na na na na na
Na na na na na na na na na na na na na

You've got every right
To a beautiful life
C'mon

Who says, who says you're not perfect?
Who says you're not worth it?
Who says you're the only one that's hurtin'?
Trust me, that's the price of beauty
Who says you're not pretty?
Who says you're not beautiful?
Who says?

Who says you're not star potential?
Who says you're not presidential?
Who says you can't be in movies?
Listen to me, listen to me
Who says you don't pass the test?
Who says you can't be the best?
Who said, who said?
Would you tell me who said that?
Yeah, who said?

Who says, who says you're not perfect? (yeah)
Who says you're not worth it? (yeah yeah)
Who says you're the only one that's hurtin'? (oh)
Trust me, that's the price of beauty (hey yeah, beauty)
Who says you're not pretty? (who said?)
Who says you're not beautiful? (I'm just beautiful me)
Who says?

Who says you're the only one that's hurtin'?

Trust me (yeah), that's the price of beauty

Who says?

text.text:
Диққат, касб-ҳунар мактабларига қабул бошланди

Давлат комиссияси

text:
г ҳужжатлари онлайн қабул қилинади.

2020/2021 ўқув йили учун касб-ҳунар мактабларига
ҳужжатларини қабул қилиш жараёнлари онлайн тарзда

электрон платформаси орқали амалга оширилади.

Ўқувчилар ушбу платформа орқали
❇️ Касб-ҳунар мактабларида қуйидаги ва бошқа турдаги
фанлари интеграциялашган дастурлари асосида ўқитилади. Ўқувчига

text.text: ўзи танлаган касб бўйича билим берилади.

а қўнғироқ қилиб, ўзларини қизиқтирган барча саволларга жавоб  олишлари мумкин.

text.text:
​​My last made me feel like I would never try again
But when I saw you, I felt something I never felt
Come closer, I'll give you all my love
If you treat me right, baby, I'll give you everything
My last made me feel like I would never try again
But when I saw you, I felt something I never felt
Come closer, I'll give you all my love
If you treat me right, baby, I'll give you everything

Talk to me, I need to hear you need me like I need you
Fall for me, I wanna know you feel how I feel for you, love
Before you, baby, I was numb, drown the pain by pouring up
Speeding fast on the run, never want to get caught up
Now you the one that I'm calling
Swore that I'd never forget, don't think I'm just talking
I think I might go all in, no exceptions, girl, I need ya

Feeling like I'm out of my mind, 'cause I can't get enough
Only one that I give my time, 'cause I got time for ya
Might make an exception for ya, 'cause I been feeling ya
Think I might be out of my mind, I think that you're the one

Come closer, I'll give you all my love

But when I saw you, I felt something I never felt
Come closer, I'll give you all my love

I'll never give my all again
'Cause I'm sick of falling down
When I open up and give my trust
They find a way to break it down
Tear me up inside, and you break me down

Каждому в угоду не значит здесь быть собой
Заводной паренёк не достиг ничего
Но душа твоя просится в рай
Пока молод и глуп моё сердце кричит
Паренёк не гони отдыхай

В отрыв каждый день, эйфория каждый день
Пацаны каждый день, здесь миллионы людей

text.text: Самарқандда туғилган cиам эгизаклари вафот этди

text: Жорий йилнинг 29 июнида оммавий ахборот воситалари ҳамда ижтимоий тармоқларда Самарқандда икки бошли чақалоқ дунёга келганлиги ҳақида хабар

Шу йилнинг 25 июнида фуқаро М.Ч. ҳомиланинг 38 хафталиги билан вилоят Перинатал марказига мурожаат қилган ҳамда 27 июнь, шанба куни ундан сиам эгизаклари дунёга келган.

Чақалоқларда нафас ва юрак етишмовчилиги борлиги, уларга доимий намланган ва илитилган кислород билан нафас олиши ҳамда тажрибали мутахассислар назоратида бўлиши зарурлиги сабабли эгизаклар жорий йилнинг 29 июнь куни Самарқанд вилояти болалар кўп тармоқли тиббиёт марказига ўтказилган эди.

text.text: Бугун, 06 июнь куни вилоят болалар кўп тармоқли тиббиёт маркази шифокорлар томонидан ўтказилган тезкор реанимацион муолажаларга қарамасдан, чақалоқларда кўп сонли туғма ривожланиш нуқсонлар борлиги сабабли дастлаб соат 7:50 да сиам эгизакларининг биринчиси, 10:50 да эса иккинчиси нафас ва юрак етишмовчилиги туфайли вафот этди,

text: деб хабар беради Самарқанд вилояти соғлиқни сақлаш бошқармаси Ахборот хизмати.

text.text:
​​​​🎼 ​​"Mother"
🎤 Sami Yusuf

Blessed is your face
Blessed is your name
My beloved

Blessed is your smile
which makes my soul want to fly
My beloved

All the nights and all the times that
you cared for me

But I never realised it
And now it's too late
Forgive me 

Now I'm alone
filled with so much shame

For all the years
I caused you pain

If only I could sleep
in your arms again

Mother, I'm lost without you

You were the sun
that brightened my day

Now who's gonna wipe
my tears away?

If only I knew
what I know today

Mother, I'm lost without you

text.text: Имтихонлар онлайн бўлмайди - ДТМ расмий баёноти

text: Ахборот ва оммавий коммуникациялар агентлигида Ўзбекистон Республикасига

text.text: коронавируснинг кириб келиши ва тарқалишининг олдини олиш юзасидан чора-тадбирлар дастурини тайёрлаш бўйича

text:
Республика махсус комиссиясининг ахбороти юзасидан матбуот анжумани бўлиб ўтди.

Мазкур матбуот анжуманидан сўнг турли манбаларда давлат олий таълим муассасаларининг бакалавриат таълим йўналишларига кириш имтиҳонлари онлайн бўлиши мумкинлиги ҳақида

.

Шуни эслатиб ўтиш жоизки, Ўзбекистон Республикаси Президентининг

«Олий таълим муассасаларига тест синовлари орқали қабул қилиш тизимини такомиллаштириш бўйича қўшимча чора-тадбирлар тўғрисида»ги қарорига мувофиқ олий таълим муассасаларининг бакалавриат таълим йўналишларига мос тест синови топшириладиган фанлар мажмуаси, баҳолаш мезонлари, тест топшириқлари сони ҳамда тест синовларини ўтказишнинг аниқ муддатлари

text.text: Ўзбекистон Республикаси таълим муассасаларига ўқишга қабул қилиш бўйича Давлат комиссияси

text:
томонидан белгиланади.

Ҳозирги кунда Давлат тест маркази томонидан тест синовларини

text.text: ҳар йилги шаклда, катта сиғимли биноларда, санитария-гигиена талабларига риоя этилган ҳолда

text:
ўтказиш бўйича тайёргарлик ишлари олиб борилмоқда.

Шуни маълум қиламизки, давлат олий таълим муассасаларининг бакалавриат таълим йўналишларига

P.S. Бу нимаси энди Республика махсус комиссияси?

Ҳар қандай қарорнинг негизида қандайдир мантиқ, асос ва соҳа мутахассислари билан маслаҳатлашилган бўлиши керак. Осмондан олинган тартиб-таомиллар нафақат самарасиз, одамларда ортиқча саволларнинг кўпайишига олиб келади.


👉
| Абитуриент ахборот хизматининг телеграм каналига уланиш учун 👇👇👇

messages.from: Online English lessons and Japanese language
messages.author: Temurbek Sobirov
text:
Ingliz-tilida suhbat davomida eng ko'p qo'llaniladigan qisqartmalar (2)

16. Tell’em = Tell them - ayt ularga
E.g. I don’t wanna tell’em - men ularga aytishni xohlamayman

17. Cos = Because - chunki
E.g. I don’t like this house cos it’s too big - menga bu uy yoqmayapti chunki o'ta katta ekan

18. Bitta = bit of - ozgina, sal

19. I’mma = I’m going to - ...moqchiman
E.g. I’mma talk to her - men u bilan gaplashmoqchiman

20. Gonna = Going to - ...moqchi
E.g. I'm not gonna tell you - senga aytmoqchimasman

21. Needa = Need to - kerak/muhtoj
E.g. You needa know about him - sen u haqida bilishing kerak

22. Oughta = Ought to - kerak
E.g. You oughta phone your sister - Siz singlingizga telefon qilishingiz kerak

23. Hafta = Have to - kerak
E.g. You hafta go - siz ketishingiz kerak

24. Hasta = Has to - kerak
E.g. She hasta work today - u bugun ishlashi kerak

25. Usta = Used to - manosi: oldin shunaqa edi, hozir unaqa emas
E.g. She usta live in London - u (oldin) Londonda yashar edi

26. Supposta = Supposed to - kerak
(chunki oldindan kelishilgan yoki so'z berilgan)
E.g. I’m supposta start a new job on Tuesday - men Seshanbada yangi ish boshlashim kerak

27. C'mon = Come on - 1-qo'ysangchi, 2-bo'laqol
E.g. Cmon, hurry up! - bo'laqol, shoshil/tezro bo'l!

28. Ya = You/you are - siz
E.g. Who saw ya? - Sizni kim ko'rdi?

29. Gotta = (have) got a - bor/ega
E.g. Have you gotta phone? - Telefoningiz bormi?

30. Shoulda = Should have - kerak edi
E.g. I shoulda called yesterday - kecha telefon qilishim kerak edi

️🇬🇧Eng sara dars va qo'llanmalar bizning kanalda🔝

🌐Kanalimizga obuna bo'ling

work for – работать на (компанию, фирму)
work on – работать над (проектом, дизайном)
run a business – руководить учреждением
manage a team – управлять командой
work under somebody – работать на кого-либо
responsibilities – обязанности
responsible for = in charge of – ответственный за
deal with – иметь дело с
leave home for work at – уходить на работу в
go to work – ехать/идти на работу
get to work/arrive at work – прийти/прибыть на работу
at work – на работе
off work – пропускать/не приходить на работу
in work – имеющий работу
out of work – без работы/безработный
full-time job – работа на полную ставку/в полную смену
part-time job – работа на полставки
to work full-time – работать на полную ставку
to work part-time – работать на полставки

temporary job – временная работа
development department – отдел перспективного проектирования
financial report – финансовый отчет
from start to finish – от начала до конца

text.text:
Ingliz tilini qo'shiqlarda o'rganing
🔘 Alan Walker

text:
You were the shadow to my light
Did you feel us?
Another star, you fade away
Afraid our aim is out of sight
Wanna see us, alive
🇺🇿

text.text:
Nurimga soya eding
Bilarmiding ?
Boshqa yulduz , sen so'lding
Manzilim ko'zdan yiroq , qo'rqaman
Yorqinligimizni xohlaysanmi?

text:
Where are you now?
Where are you now?
Where are you now?
Was it all in my fantasy?
Where are you now?
Were you only imaginary?
🇺🇿

text.text:
Qayerdasan ?
Barchasi xayolmidi?
Qayerdasan ?
Shunchaki tasavvurimmiding?

text:
Where are you now?
Atlantis, under the sea, under the sea
Where are you now?
Another dream
The monster's running wild inside of me
I'm faded, I'm faded
So lost, I'm faded, I'm faded
So lost, I'm faded
🇺🇿

text.text:
Qayerdasan?
Atlantida, suv ostida
Qayerdasan ? Boshqa xayol
Asov maxluq ichimda chopmoqda
So'lg'inman , so'lg'in
O'zimni yo'qotdim , so'lganman

text:
These shallow waters never met what I needed
I'm letting go, a deeper dive
Eternal silence of the sea
I'm breathing, alive
🇺🇿

Chuqurroq sho'ng'ishga kirishdim
Dengizning abadiy sukuti
Nafas olyapman , hayotman

text:
Love me, love me
Say that you love me
Fool me, fool me
Go on and fool me

Dear, I fear we're facing a problem
You love me no longer, I know
And maybe there is nothing that I can do
To make you do

Mama tells me, I shouldn't bother
That I ought to stick to another man
A man that surely deserves me
But I think you do

So I cry and I pray, and I beg for you to

Love me, love me
Say that you love me
Fool me, fool me
Go on and fool me
Love me, love me
Pretend that you love me
Leave me, leave me
Just say that you need me

Love me, love me
Fool me, fool me
Love me, love me
Fool me, fool me

Lately, I have desperately pondered
Spent my nights awake and I wondered
What I could have done in another way
To make you stay

Reason will not reach a solution
I will end up lost in confusion
I don't care if you really care

text:
Кураш фалсафаси...

Шогирд устозидан сўради:
– Агар йиқилганимдан хабар топсангиз, нима дердингиз? – Тур, дердим.
– Яна йиқилсам-чи? 
– Яна тур, дердим. 
– Бу ҳолат қачонгача давом этиши мумкин: йиқиласан, турасан, йиқиласан, турасан? 
– Тирик экансан, йиқилавер, ўрнингдан туравер. Фақат ўликларгина йиқилиб қайта турмайдилар.

▶️

messages.from: Online English lessons and Japanese language
messages.author: Temurbek Sobirov

text.text:
Look
If you had
One shot
Or one opportunity
To seize everything you ever wanted
In one moment
Would you capture it
Or just let it slip?

text:
Yo
His palms are sweaty, knees weak, arms are heavy
There's vomit on his sweater already, mom's spaghetti
He's nervous, but on the surface he looks calm and ready
To drop bombs, but he keeps on forgettin'
What he wrote down, the whole crowd goes so loud
He opens his mouth, but the words won't come out
He's chokin', how, everybody's jokin' now
The clocks run out, times up, over, blaow
Snap back to reality, oh there goes gravity
Oh, there goes Rabbit, he choked
He's so mad, but he won't give up that easy? No
He won't have it, he knows his whole back's to these ropes
It don't matter, he's dope, he knows that, but he's broke
He's so stagnant, he knows, when he goes back to this mobile home, that's when it's
Back to the lab again, yo, this whole rhapsody
Better go capture this moment and hope it don't pass him

You better lose yourself in the music, the moment
You own it, you better never let it go
You only get one shot, do not miss your chance to blow
This opportunity comes once in a lifetime

You better lose yourself in the music, the moment
You own it, you better never let it go
You only get one shot, do not miss your chance to blow
This opportunity comes once in a lifetime
You better

His soul's escaping, through this hole that is gaping
This world is mine for the taking
Make me king, as we move toward a New World Order
A normal life is borin', but super stardom's close to post mortem
It only grows harder, only grows hotter
He blows, it's all over, these hoes is all on him
Coast to coast shows, he's known as the Globetrotter
Lonely roads, God only knows, he's grown farther from home, he's no father
He goes home and barely knows his own daughter
But hold your nose 'cause here goes the cold water
These hoes don't want him no mo', he's cold product
They moved on to the next schmo who flows, he nose dove and sold nada
So the soap opera is told and unfolds, I suppose it's old partna, but the beat goes on
Da-da-dum, da-dum, da-da

You better lose yourself in the music, the moment
You own it, you better never let it go
You only get one shot, do not miss your chance to blow
This opportunity comes once in a lifetime

You better lose yourself in the music, the moment
You own it, you better never let it go
You only get one shot, do not miss your chance to blow
This opportunity comes once in a lifetime
You better

No more games, I'ma change what you call rage
Tear this motherfuckin' roof off like two dogs caged
I was playin' in the beginnin', the mood all changed
I been chewed up and spit out and booed off stage
But I kept rhymin' and stepped right in the next cypher
Best believe somebody's payin' the Pied Piper
All the pain inside amplified by the
Fact that I can't get by with my nine to
Five and I can't provide the right type of
Life for my family 'cause man, these goddamn food stamps don't buy diapers
And its no movie, there's no Mekhi Phifer
This is my life and these times are so hard
And it's getting even harder tryna feed and water my seed, plus
Teeter totter, caught up between bein' a father and a prima donna
Baby mama drama, screamin' on her, too much
For me to wanna stay in one spot, another day of monotony's
Gotten me to the point, I'm like a snail I've got
To formulate a plot or end up in jail or shot
Success is my only motherfuckin' option, failure's not
Mom, I love you, but this trailer's got to go, I cannot grow old in Salem's Lot
So here I go, is my shot
Feet, fail me not, this may be the only opportunity that I got

You better lose yourself in the music, the moment
You own it, you better never let it go
You only get one shot, do not miss your chance to blow
This opportunity comes once in a lifetime[

🔸 decent — odobli, yaxshi xulqli
🔸 indecent — beadab
🔸 honest — to‘g‘riso‘z
🔸 fair — to‘g‘riso‘z, adolatli
🔸 sincere — samimiy
🔸 dishonest — g‘irrom, noinsof
🔸 innocent — aybsiz, begunoh
🔸 guilty — aybdor
🔸 criminal — jinoyatchi
🔸 kind — mehribon
🔸 hostile — adovatli, dushmanlik
🔸 gentle — yuvosh, beozor
🔸 polite — odobli, xushmuomalali
🔸 rude — qo‘pol
🔸 generous — saxiy
🔸 close-fisted — qizg‘anchiq, qurumsoq
🔸 talkative — gapdon, ko‘p gapiradigan
🔸 sociable — kirishimli, dilkash
🔸 reserved — vazmin
🔸 docile — itoatli
🔸 disobedient — itoatsiz, gapga kirmaydigan
🔸 strict — talabchan
🔸 mild — yumshoq, muloyim
🔸 reliable — ishonchli
🔸 changeable — o‘zgaruvchan
🔸 brave — mard, jasur
🔸 courageous — mard
🔸 cowardly — qo‘rqoq
🔸 timid — jur'atsiz, tortinchoq
🔸 reasonable — ongli, idrokli
🔸 prudent — mulohazali, o‘ylab ish qiladigan
🔸 light-minded — yengiltak

🔸 incautious — beparvo

text:
"Love You Like A Love Song"

It's been said and done
Every beautiful thought's been already sung
And I guess right now here's another one
So your melody will play on and on, with the best of 'em
You are beautiful, like a dream come alive, incredible
A centerfold miracle, lyrical
You saved my life again
And I want you to know baby

I, I love you like a love song, baby
I, I love you like a love song, baby
I, I love you like a love song, baby

And I keep hitting re-peat-peat-peat-peat-peat-peat

I, I love you like a love song, baby
I, I love you like a love song, baby
I, I love you like a love song, baby

And I keep hitting re-peat-peat-peat-peat-peat-peat

Constantly, boy, you play through my mind like a symphony
There's no way to describe what you do to me
You just do to me, what you do
And it feels like I've been rescued
I've been set free
I am hypnotized by your destiny
You are magical, lyrical, beautiful
You are
And I want you to know, baby

I, I love you like a love song, baby
I, I love you like a love song, baby
I, I love you like a love song, baby

And I keep hitting re-peat-peat-peat-peat-peat-peat

I, I love you like a (love song, baby) love song, baby
I, I love you like a (love song, baby) love song, baby
I, I love you (I love you, I love you) like a love song, baby

And I keep hitting re-peat-peat-peat-peat-peat-peat (like a love song)

No one compares
You stand alone, to every record I own
Music to my heart that's what you are
A song that goes on and on

I, I love you like a love song, baby
I, I love you like a love song, baby
I, I love you like a love song, baby

And I keep hitting re-peat-peat-peat-peat-peat-peat

I, I love you like a love song, baby
I, I love you like a love song, baby
I, I love you like a love song, baby

I love you... like a love song

text.text:
​​Simona
You're getting older
Your journey's been etched
On your skin

Simona
Wish I had known that know
What seemed so strong
Has been and gone

I would call you up everyday Saturday night
And we'd both stay out until the morning light
And we sang, here we go again
And though time goes by
I will always be
In a club with you
In nineteen seventy three
Singing, here we go again

Simona
Wish I was sober
So I could see clearly now
The rain has gone

My memory plays our tune

text:
1. Ertalab turib yugurishni boshlayman
2. Ko'proq sayohat qilaman
3. Ingliz tilini o'rganaman
...
Sizga bu so'zlar juda ham tanish to'g'rimi? 🤔 Har yili o'sha o'sha va'dalar va bu va'dalar, va'daligicha qoladi. Buni o'zgartirishning vaqti kelmadimkin? Qanday qilib deysizmi? O'z vadalaringizni

text.text: Stafford Academy, barcha darajadagi  Ingliz tili o'rganuvchilariga 2 kunlik mutlaqo bepul onlayn darslar

text:
o'tkazadi va siz bu vaqtning ichida:

-O'z bilim darajangizni aniqlab olasiz
-Ovozli habarlar orqali Ingliz tilini amaliyotda qo'llaysiz
-O'z kundaligingizga ega bo'lasiz va amaliy mashg'ulotlar bajarasiz
-Ustoz bilan alohida Kundalik yaratasiz
-Va 2ta sovg'aga ega bo'lasiz

text.text:
Siz hali ham o'ylanyabsizmi?
Boshqalar allaqachon bizga qo'shilishdi. Siz ham tengdoshlaringizdan qolib ketmang!

messages.from: Online English lessons and Japanese language
messages.author: Temurbek Sobirov
text:
concoct - состряпать (что-н. необычное из разных продуктов)
condone — мириться с чем-л.; попустительствовать, потворствовать чему-л.
congenial - сходный, близкий по духу; родственный
congenital deafness — врождённая глухота
consensus — единодушие, согласие
contiguous — соприкасающийся; смежный; граничащий, прилегающий
convivial — праздничный; пиршественный
cryptic remark — непонятное, загадочное высказывание; загадочная реплика
culpable — виновный, преступный; заслуживающий порицания, осуждения
curtail — сокращать, укорачивать; урезывать, уменьшать
dangle — болтать (ногами)
dearth — недостаток продуктов; голод; голодание
deference - уважение, почтение
delineate — набрасывать, чертить, намечать
derogatory remark — пренебрежительное замечание
diligent — прилежный, старательный, исполнительный (о людях)
disparage — унижать достоинство, принижать
docile — восприимчивый, понятливый, способный
doleful — скорбный, печальный; меланхолический; страдальческий, унылый.

text:
-- once a year, yearly
✍ For example -- birthday is an annual event 

⚡️

--  Synonyms: Norm, normal .
✍ example -- The average cost of making a movie has risen by 15%.

⚡️

-- living near or about human habitations
✍ For example -- Nowadays there is more sharing of domestic chores.

⚡️

-- to think about carefully
✍ For example --Have you considered the possibility of retraining?

⚡️

--- pay no attention to something 
✍ For example --- You can’t ignore the fact that many criminals never go to prison.


🌴

- bir yilda bir marta bo'ladigan, bir yillik.
🌴

text.text: Birlikda kelgan ot shu buyum qarashli bo'lgan butun turni ifodalaganda aniq artikle bilan ishlatiladi

text:
The pine grows in northern countries 


✅ Otlashgan sifat yoki sifatdosh oldidan aniq artikl ishlatiladi  .Otlashgan sifat yoki sifatdosh birlikda kelib ko'plik ma'nosida ishlatiladi .

text.text: The poor in some countries live in slums
The wounded were taken to the hospital

text: ✅ Orttirma darajadi sifat bilan kelgan ot aniq artikl bilan ishlatiladi  .

text.text: The highest mountains are in Asia

text: ✅ Tartib sonlar bilan kelgan otlar oldida aniq artikl ishlatiladi  .

text.text: The office is on the second floor
Agar tartib son ikkinchi bir , yana bir ma'nosida ishlatilsa noaniq artikl bilan ishlatiladi

text: We must charter a second vessel .

text.text:
Same - bir xil 
Next , following - keyingi , kelgusi 
Last - oxirgi 
Very - ayni 
Only - yakka - yagona 
Proper - mos 
Vious - oldingi 
Opposite - teskarisi 
Necessary - kerakli 
So - called
Adjacent - yonidagi 
Alleged - havola qilinadigan

text:
Eslatma : Next  - kelasi  .
Last - o'tgan ma'nosida quyudagi birikmalarda artiklesiz ishlatiladi  .

❌ next week 
❌ next month
❌ next year 
❌ last week 
❌ last month 
❌ last year

text_entities.text: Birlikda kelgan ot shu buyum qarashli bo'lgan butun turni ifodalaganda aniq artikle bilan ishlatiladi

The pine grows in northern countries 


✅ Otlashgan sifat yoki sifatdosh oldidan aniq artikl ishlatiladi  .Otlashgan sifat yoki sifatdosh birlikda kelib ko'plik ma'nosida ishlatiladi .
The poor in some countries live in slums
The wounded were taken to the hospital
✅ Orttirma darajadi sifat bilan kelgan ot aniq artikl bilan ishlatiladi  .
The highest mountains are in Asia
✅ Tartib sonlar bilan kelgan otlar oldida aniq artikl ishlatiladi  .
The office is on the second floor
Agar tartib son ikkinchi bir , yana bir ma'nosida ishlatilsa noaniq artikl bilan ishlatiladi
We must charter a second vessel .

Same - bir xil 
Next , following - keyingi , kelgusi 
Last - oxirgi 
Very - ayni 
Only - yakka - yagona 
Proper - mos 
Vious - oldingi 
Opposite - teskarisi 
Necessary - kerakli 
So - called
Adjacent - yonidagi 
Alleged - havola qilinadigan

Eslatma : Next  - kelasi  .
Last - o'tgan ma'nosida quyudagi birikmalarda artiklesiz ishlatiladi  .

text:
ma'nosida ishlatiladigan ingliz tilidagi so'zlar va ularning farqlarini ko'rib chiqamiz.

1️⃣

text.text: (kutilmagan, rejalashtirilmagan) ish-harakatlarga nisbatan sodir bo'lmoq degan ma'noda ishlatiladi
*used especially when talking about events that have not been planned
bo'lib o'tmoq, odatda oldindan rejalashtirilgan ish-harakatlar uchun ishlatiladi
*to happen – used especially when talking about events that have been planned or that have already happened
(kutilmagan, rejalashtirilmagan) ish-harakatlarga nisbatan sodir bo'lmoq degan ma'noda ishlatiladi, to happen fe'liga nisbatan rasmiyroq hisoblanadi.

text: 🔸There aren’t any jobs at the moment, but we’ll let you know if something

yuzaga chiqmoq, paydo bo'lmoq, kutilmagan holda yuzaga chiqadigan muammo, qiyin vaziyatga nisbatan ishlatiladi

text:
about who should receive the money.
🔸It is best to deal with the problem as soon as it

paydo bo'lmoq, yuzaga chiqmoq degan ma'noda mayda masalalar, masalan shu yerni o'zida hal qilinadigan muammolarga nisbatan ishlatiladi.

text: 🔸The banks will contact their customers if a problem

text.text: *to happen – used about problems or difficult situations, especially ones that are less serious, and can quickly be dealt with
to'satdan, kutilmaganda sodir bo'ladigan fojea, halokatlar uchun ishlatiladi.

text.text: *to happen suddenly and unexpectedly – used about very bad events
bo'lib chiqmoq, sodir bo'lmoq, odatiy tarzda sodir bo'ladigan ish-harakatlar uchun ishlatiladi

o'g'ri va boshqa m'anolarni bildiradigan ingliz tilidagi so'zlarning farqlarini ko'rib chiqamiz.

1️⃣

text.text: o'g'ri, talonchi (someone who steals things from a person or place)

text:
grabbed her handbag and ran off down the street.
🔸Car

text.text: o'g'ri (someone who goes into houses, offices etc to steal things)

text:
broke into the house and took a computer worth £1,000.
🔸Police believe the

got in through the kitchen window.

3️⃣

text.text: (someone who steals from banks, offices, houses etc, especially using threats or violence)

text:
broke into the shop and demanded money from the till.

4️⃣

text.text: do'kon o'g'risi (someone who takes things from shops without paying for them, especially by hiding them in their clothes or in a bag)

text: 🔸The store has installed hidden cameras to catch

text.text: kissavur (someone who steals from people’s pockets, especially in a crowded public place)
talonchi (a thief who violently attacks someone in the street and robs them)

text:
punched him in the face and tried to steal his wallet.

7️⃣

text.text: mashina o'g'risi (someone who steals a car and drives it very fast for fun)

text:
Police pursued the teenage joyriders across three counties.

8️⃣

text.text: marodyor (falokat paytidan foydalanib, o'g'irlik yoki talonchilik qiladigan shaxs (someone who breaks into shops or homes and steals things, after there has been a natural disaster, a war, or a violent protest)
bandit, qaroqchi (a member of an armed group of thieves who travel around attacking people in country areas)

text: 🔸The village was attacked by a gang of

text.text: brokoner (hayvonarni noqonuniy ov qiluvchi shaxs) (someone who hunts animals, birds etc illegally on other people’s land)

text:
from killing the elephants.

Bizning postlarimizdan foydalanishsin,zero,boshqalardek postlarni o'g'irlashga muhtoj qilmasin.
Eng ishonchli va rasmiy kanalimiz 👇👇👇👇

messages.from: Online English lessons and Japanese language
messages.author: Temurbek Sobirov
text:
МУҲАББАТ ҲАҚИДА "ЧЎПЧАКЛАР"...

📌Фақат юракдагина энг баланд самовий юксакликка кўтарилиш мумкин.

Жалолиддин Румий

📌Тўғри, Севги олам гардишини айлантирмайди. Севги шу гардиш айланишига маъно бағишлайди.

Франклин Жонес

📌Севиш доимо қўлидан келадиган аёл ҳеч қачон кексаймайди.

Жин Патсл Ричер

📌Севгининг боши ва интиҳоси биз ўйлаганчалик эмас. Муҳаббат бу – кураш. Муҳаббат бу – уруш! Севиш бу – улғайиш демакдир.

Жеймс Балдвин

📌Севги – бу бир-бирига тикилиш эмас, бир-бирининг ички дунёсини ўрганишдир.

Антуан де Cент Экзюпери

📌Севги фасллар алмашинувига бўйсунмай унувчи ва ғунча тугадиган ягона гулдир.

Жуброн Халил Жуброн

📌Худони англашнинг энг яхши йўли унинг – бандаларини севишдир.

Ван Гог

📌Йўқлик севгини заифлаштириб, ишонч, садоқат каби ундан-да буюк туйғуларнинг пайдо бўлишига хизмат қилади. Худди қандилни ўчирган шамол гулханни аланга олдиргандек.

Франциз де Ла Рочфоколд

📌Севиш – бир зумга бўлса-да жаннатий ҳаловатга эришиш демакдир.

Карен Сунде

📌Ҳақиқий севги беминнат қайғуриш бошланган дақиқадан туғилади.

Антуан де Cент Экзюпери

📌Чин муҳаббат ғийбатга ўхшайди: у тўғрида ҳамма гапиради, аммо камдан-кам киши унинг гувоҳи бўлган.

Франциз де Ла Рочфоколд

📌Севги кўп нарсани ваъда қилмаса ҳам, севиб қолган ошиқ кўп нарсага қодир бўлиб қолади.

Франк Тиббетс

📌Севги ҳеч қачон кексаймайди. Эҳтимол киприк тўкилиб соч оқарар, балки ёноқлардан нур кетиб, ажин тушар, лекин севган юрак ҳеч қачон кишининг қаҳратон совуғини ҳис қилмайди.

Леонардо да Винчи

📌Муҳаббат йўқ жойда мангу яшагандан кўра, ўлим ҳукмрон ерда яшаб, севишни афзал биламан.

Роберт Инжерсол

📌Севги ёнимиздаги аёлнинг биз каби яшаётгани ва нафас олаётганини, биз каби ўйлаб, қувонч-дардимизга шерик бўлаётганини ҳис қилишдир.

Баронез Оркзи

📌Севги ин қурса, ошиққа маҳбубасининг ҳуснбузари ҳам кулгич бўлиб кўринади.

Япон халқ мақоли

📌Бу дунёда эркак киши эгалик қила оладиган энг қимматли нарса – аёл қалбидир.

Жосиа Ҳолланд

text:
24-iyul-prezident Shavkat Mirziyoyev tavallud topgan kun.

✅ Shavkat Miromonovich Mirziyoyev (tugʻ. 24-iyul, 1957-yil, Zomin tumani, Jizzax viloyati, OʻzSSR) — Oʻzbekiston Prezidenti (2016-yil 14-dekabrdan), 2003-yil 12-dekabrdan
 ✅2016-yil 13-dekabrgacha  Oʻzbekiston Bosh vaziri, 
✅ shuningdek 2016-yil 8-sentabrdan Oʻzbekistonning muvaqqat prezidenti. 
✅ 2016-yil 4-dekabrdagi prezidentlik saylovi natijasiga koʻra Oʻzbekiston Respublikasining prezidenti etib saylandi.
✅ Mehnat faoliyatini 1981-yilda Toshkent irrigatsiya va qishloq xoʻjaligini mexanizatsiyalash muhandislari institutida boshlab, kichik ilmiy xodim, katta oʻqituvchi, dotsent, oʻquv ishlari boʻyicha prorektor lavozimlarida ishladi.
✅ 1990-yili Respublika Oliy Soveti deputatligiga saylanib, bir vaqtning oʻzida Mandat komissiyasining raisi sifatida ham faoliyat koʻrsatdi.
✅  1992-yilda Toshkent shahrining Mirzo Ulugʻbek tumani hokimi lavozimiga tayinlandi.
✅  1996-2001 yillarda Jizzax viloyati hokimi.
✅  2001-2003 yillar mobaynida Samarqand viloyati hokimi

messages.from: Online English lessons and Japanese language
messages.author: Temurbek Sobirov
text:
Biografiya

Mehnat faoliyatini 1981-yilda Toshkent irrigatsiya va qishloq xoʻjaligini mexanizatsiyalash muhandislari institutida boshlab, kichik ilmiy xodim, katta oʻqituvchi, dotsent, oʻquv ishlari boʻyicha prorektor lavozimlarida ishladi.
1990-yili Respublika Oliy Soveti deputatligiga saylanib, bir vaqtning oʻzida Mandat komissiyasining raisi sifatida ham faoliyat koʻrsatdi.
1992-yilda Toshkent shahrining Mirzo Ulugʻbek tumani hokimi lavozimiga tayinlandi.
1996-2001 yillarda Jizzax viloyati hokimi.
2001-2003 yillar mobaynida Samarqand viloyati hokimi lavozimlarida ishladi.
1995-2003 yillarda Oʻzbekiston Respublikasi Oliy Majlisining deputati sifatida ham faoliyat olib bordi.
2003-yilda Oʻzbekiston Bosh vaziri etib tasdiqlandi[2][3] va 2005, 2010, 2015 yillarda Oliy Majlis palatalari tomonidan ushbu lavozimga yana uch marta qayta tasdiqlandi.
2016-yil 2-sentabrda Prezident Islom Karimovning vafot etishi munosabati bilan Oliy Majlis Mirziyoyevni Birinchi Prezident dafn marosimini oʻtkazish boʻyicha komissiyaga rais etib tayinladi.

Asarlari:

Erkin va farovon, demokratik O‘zbekiston davlatini birgalikda barpo etamiz. O‘zbekiston Respublikasi Prezidenti lavozimiga kirishish tantanali marosimiga bag‘ishlangan Oliy Majlis palatalarining qo‘shma majlisidagi nutq / Sh.M. Mirziyoyev. - Toshkent : O‘zbekiston, 2016. — 56 b.
Tanqidiy tahlil, qatʼiy tartib-intizom va shaxsiy javobgarlik — har bir rahbar faoliyatining kundalik qoidasi bo‘lishi kerak. Mamlakatimizni 2016 yilda ijtimoiy-iqtisodiy rivojlantirishning asosiy yakunlari va 2017 yilga mo‘ljallangan iqtisodiy dasturning eng muhim ustuvor yo‘nalishlariga bag‘ishlangan Vazirlar Mahkamasining kengaytirilgan majlisidagi maʼruza, 2017 yil 14 yanvar / Sh.M. Mirziyoyev. — Toshkent : O‘zbekiston, 2017. — 104 b.
Qonun ustuvorligi va inson manfaatlarini taʼminlash — yurt taraqqiyoti va xalq farovonligining garovi. O‘zbekiston Respublikasi Konstitutsiyasi qabul qilinganining 24 yilligiga bag‘ishlangan tantanali marosimdagi maʼruza. 2016 yil 7 dekabr

.M.Mirziyoev. — Toshkent: „O‘zbekiston“, 2017. — 48 b.
Buyuk kelajagimizni mard va olijanob xalqimiz bilan birga quramiz. Mazkur kitobdan O‘zbekiston Respublikasi Prezidenti Shavkat Mirziyoevning 2016 yil 1 noyabrdan 24 noyabrga qadar Qoraqalpog‘iston Respublikasi, viloyatlar va Toshkent shahri saylovchilari vakillari bilan o‘tkazilgan saylovoldi uchrashuvlarida so‘zlagan nutqlari o‘rin olgan.

.M.Mirziyoev. — Toshkent: : „O‘zbekiston“, 2017. — 488 b.[18]

text_entities.text:
Biografiya

Mehnat faoliyatini 1981-yilda Toshkent irrigatsiya va qishloq xoʻjaligini mexanizatsiyalash muhandislari institutida boshlab, kichik ilmiy xodim, katta oʻqituvchi, dotsent, oʻquv ishlari boʻyicha prorektor lavozimlarida ishladi.
1990-yili Respublika Oliy Soveti deputatligiga saylanib, bir vaqtning oʻzida Mandat komissiyasining raisi sifatida ham faoliyat koʻrsatdi.
1992-yilda Toshkent shahrining Mirzo Ulugʻbek tumani hokimi lavozimiga tayinlandi.
1996-2001 yillarda Jizzax viloyati hokimi.
2001-2003 yillar mobaynida Samarqand viloyati hokimi lavozimlarida ishladi.
1995-2003 yillarda Oʻzbekiston Respublikasi Oliy Majlisining deputati sifatida ham faoliyat olib bordi.
2003-yilda Oʻzbekiston Bosh vaziri etib tasdiqlandi[2][3] va 2005, 2010, 2015 yillarda Oliy Majlis palatalari tomonidan ushbu lavozimga yana uch marta qayta tasdiqlandi.
2016-yil 2-sentabrda Prezident Islom Karimovning vafot etishi munosabati bilan Oliy Majlis Mirziyoyevni Birinchi Prezident dafn marosimini oʻtkazish boʻyicha komissiyaga rais etib tayinladi.

Asarlari:

Erkin va farovon, demokratik O‘zbekiston davlatini birgalikda barpo etamiz. O‘zbekiston Respublikasi Prezidenti lavozimiga kirishish tantanali marosimiga bag‘ishlangan Oliy Majlis palatalarining qo‘shma majlisidagi nutq / Sh.M. Mirziyoyev. - Toshkent : O‘zbekiston, 2016. — 56 b.
Tanqidiy tahlil, qatʼiy tartib-intizom va shaxsiy javobgarlik — har bir rahbar faoliyatining kundalik qoidasi bo‘lishi kerak. Mamlakatimizni 2016 yilda ijtimoiy-iqtisodiy rivojlantirishning asosiy yakunlari va 2017 yilga mo‘ljallangan iqtisodiy dasturning eng muhim ustuvor yo‘nalishlariga bag‘ishlangan Vazirlar Mahkamasining kengaytirilgan majlisidagi maʼruza, 2017 yil 14 yanvar / Sh.M. Mirziyoyev. — Toshkent : O‘zbekiston, 2017. — 104 b.
Qonun ustuvorligi va inson manfaatlarini taʼminlash — yurt taraqqiyoti va xalq farovonligining garovi. O‘zbekiston Respublikasi Konstitutsiyasi qabul qilinganining 24 yilligiga bag‘ishlangan tantanali marosimdagi maʼruza. 2016 yil 7 dekabr

.M.Mirziyoev. — Toshkent: „O‘zbekiston“, 2017. — 48 b.
Buyuk kelajagimizni mard va olijanob xalqimiz bilan birga quramiz. Mazkur kitobdan O‘zbekiston Respublikasi Prezidenti Shavkat Mirziyoevning 2016 yil 1 noyabrdan 24 noyabrga qadar Qoraqalpog‘iston Respublikasi, viloyatlar va Toshkent shahri saylovchilari vakillari bilan o‘tkazilgan saylovoldi uchrashuvlarida so‘zlagan nutqlari o‘rin olgan.

text:
✅ Verbs + Prepositions


A
🔸 accuse sb of - da ayblamoq
🔸 advise sb on/about sth - biror kishiga maslahat bermoq
🔸 agree with sb about/on sth - kelishmoq
🔸 aim at - maqsad qilmoq
🔸 apologise to sb for sth - kechirim so'ramoq
🔸 apply to sb/sth for sth - ariza yozmoq
🔸 approve of - xursand bo'lmoq
🔸 argue with sb about/for sth -  biror narsaga bahslashmoq
🔸 arrest sb for sth - qamoqqa olmoq
🔸 arrive at a building - binoga yetib kelmoq
🔸 arrive in a city / town / country katta shahar yoki mamlakatga kelmoq
🔸 ask for  - iltimos qilmoq
🔸 associate with - qo'llab - quvatlash
_______
B
🔸 beg for - yalinmoq
🔸 believe in ishonmoq
🔸 belong to tegishli bolmoq
🔸 benefit from dan foyda  olmoq
🔸 beware of - ehtiyot bo'lmoq
🔸 blame sb for sth. Ayblamoq
🔸 blame sth on sb - ayblamoq
🔸 boast about/of 
🔸 borrow from qarz olmoq
_______
C
🔸 care about sb/sth -g'amxorlik qilmoq
🔸 care for sb/sth g'amxorlik qilmoq
🔸 choose from/between - tanlamoq
🔸 collaborate with -xizmat qilmoq
🔸 combine with - birlashtirmoq
🔸 comment on - fikr bildirmoq
🔸 communicate with aloqa qilmoq
🔸 compare with/to taqqoslamoq
🔸 compete with sb for sth musobaqalashmoq
🔸 complain to sb about/of sth - shikoyat qilmoq
🔸 concentrate on sth diqqatni qaratmoq
🔸 confess sth to sb tavba qilmoq
🔸 congratulate sb on sth tabriklamoq
🔸 connect to/with bog'lanmoq
🔸 consist of tashkil topmoq
🔸 contrast with taqqoslamoq
🔸 contribute to - hissa qoshmoq
🔸 cooperate with sb - hamkorlik qilmoq
🔸 cope with eplamoq
🔸 cover sb in/with sth - o'ramoq
🔸 criticise for tanqid qilmoq
_______
D
🔸 deal with taqsimlamoq
🔸 decide on qaror qilmoq
🔸 dedicate sth to sbbag‘ishlamoq
🔸 depart fromjo‘natmoq
🔸 depend on bog‘liq bo‘lmoq
🔸 describe sth to sb tasvirlamoq
🔸 differ from farqlanmoq
🔸 disagree with sb about/on sth qarshi bo‘lmoq
🔸 disapprove of yaxshilamoq
🔸 discourage from umidsizlantirmoq
🔸 distinguish between ajratmoq
🔸 divide sth between/among bo‘lmoq
🔸 divide sth into bo‘lmoq
🔸 divide by (Maths) orqali bo‘lmoq
🔸 dream about/of orzu qilmoq
_______
E
🔸 escape from dan qochmoq
🔸 exchange sth for sth else uchun almashtirmoq
🔸 excuse sb for/from kechirim so‘ramoq
🔸 experiment on sb/sth with sth 
🔸 explain sth to  tushuntirmoq
_______
F
🔸 fight with urishmoq
🔸 fill sth with sth else to‘ldirmoq
🔸 forget about unutmoq
_______
G
🔸 glance at baqrayib qaramoq
_______
H
🔸 head for/towards harakatlanmoq
🔸 hear about/of sb/sth haqida eshitmoq
🔸 hear from sb dan eshitmoq 
🔸 hope for umid qilmoq
_______
I
🔸 include in o‘z ichiga olmoq
🔸 insist on tashkil topmoq
🔸 introduce sb to sb/sth tanishtirmoq
🔸 invest in joylamoq
🔸 invite to tashrif buyurmoq
🔸 involve in jalb qilmoq
_______
J
🔸 join in qo‘shilmoq
_______
K
🔸 know about sth haqida bilmoq
_______
L
🔸 lean on/against suyanmoq
🔸 lie to sb about sth aldamoq
🔸 listen to tinglamoq
_______
M
🔸 (be) made of/from dan yasalgan
🔸 mean by jiddiy bo‘lmoq
🔸 mention to eslatmoq
🔸 mistake sb/sth for sb/sth else xato qilmoq
_______
O
🔸 object to sb/sth e'tiroz bildirmoq
🔸 occur to xayoliga kelmoq
_______
P
🔸 pay for uchun to‘lamoq
🔸 point at/to  ko‘rsatmoq
🔸 praise sb for sth maqtanmoq
🔸 pray for sb/sth ibodat  qilmoq
🔸 prefer to afzal ko‘rmoq
🔸 prepare for uchun tayyorlamoq
🔸 prevent from oldini olmoq
🔸 protect sb from/against sth saqlamoq
🔸 protest about/against/at norozi bo‘lmoq
🔸 provide sb with sth boqmoq
🔸 provide sth for sb boqmoq
🔸 punish sb for uchun jazolamoq
🔸 put the blame for sth on sb ayb qo‘ymoq

🔰 Join and share with your friends!👇🏻

✔️

text:
So'zlashuv uchun: Lug'at
⚡️ Kunlik iboralar

🎯 Anyway - Har qanday holatda ham
🎯 Always at all - Umuman
🎯 Therefore - Shu sababga ko'ra
🎯 Though - Garchand, garchi, ... ga qaramasdan
🎯 Although - Garchand, garchi, ... ga qaramasdan

🎯 Mean - Ungacha, hozircha
🎯 Nevertheless -  Lekin, shunday bo'lsada, baribir
🎯 Perhaps - Balki, bo'lishi mumkin
🎯 Probably - Balki, bo'lishi mumkin
🎯 To put it mildly - Yumshoq qilib aytganda

🎯 At all - Umuman
🎯 In any case - Har qanaqa holatda ham
🎯 To tell the truth - To'g'risini aytganda
🎯 So - Ho'sh

🎯 How awful! - Qanday yomon!
🎯 On short time - Tez orada
🎯 Come up - Paydo b’lmoq
🎯 Fortnight - Ikki hafta
🎯 Condition - Shart

🎯 Now and then - Onda sonda
🎯 Moreover - Undan tashqari

text:
✅Vocabulary time📋

 Along - bo'ylab

🔸to run along – ketmoq 
🔸to move along – o’tmoq 
🔸to take along – o’zi bilan olib ketmoq 
🔸to bring along – muvofiq kelmoq 
🔸to come along – hamrohlik qilmoq 
🔸to pass along – o’tmoq, uzatib yubormoq 
🔸to get along – amallab kun kechirmoq 
🔸to get along without food – ovqatsiz amallamoq 
🔸to get along in years – keksaymoq
🔸to go along with – kelishmoq, chiqishmoq 
🔸right along – doim, muntazam  
🔸along the highway – kata yo’l bo’ylab
🔸along the lines of – shekilli  
🔸along with – birgalikda 
🔸along for the ride – tasodifan qo’shilgan  
🔸all along of – tufayli  
🔸along the lines – yo’nalishda 
🔸along with – shuningdek, birgalikda

messages.author: Temurbek Sobirov
text:
So'z boyligimizni oshiramiz
🚩 Predlogli birikmalar


💥 After all = ga qaramasdan
💥 All along = har doim
💥 All of a sudden = to'satdan
💥 All the same = bir xil
💥 Angry with = achchiqlanmoq
💥 As a rule = odatda 
💥 As far as I am concerned = mening fikrimcha
💥 As for me = meni o'ylashimcha
💥 Be about to = tayyor bo'lmoq
💥 Be back on ones feet = healthy again or better financially 
💥 Be beside oneself = juda havotirlangan, achchiqlangan 
💥 Be in the red = qarzga botmoq
💥 Bored by = charchagan bo'lmoq
💥 Capable of = ga qobilyatli bo'lmoq

42.  in honour of - sharafiga 
43.  hunting - ov qilish 
44.  ice-hockey - xokkey 
45.  symbolize - simvol qilib olmoq 
46.  visitors team - mehmonlar komandasi 
47.  win - yutmoq 
48.  wrestling - kurash 
49.  bencher - zapas o`yinchi 
50.  big league games -yuqori liga komandalari o`yini 
51.  to be in an off-side position - o`yindan yuqori holatda bo`lmoq 
52.  centre back - markaziy himoyachi 
53.  chalenger - raqib 
54.  corner kick - burchakdan tepish 
55.  cup - kubok 
56.  to cut off - ushlab qolmoq 
57.  defeat - yutqazish 63 
58.  to defeat - yutqazmoq 
59.  direct free kick - jarima to`pi(ni) 
60.  drive - qattiq zarba 
61.  fieldplayer - maydondagi o`yinchi 
62.  to foil - zarbani qaytarmoq 
63.  forward - hujumchi 
64.  fullback - himoyachi 
65.  from well out - uzoqdan 
66.  from close in - yaqindan 
67.  gate jam - darvoza oldida sur-sur 
68.  goal - darvoza, gol 
69.  halfback - yarim himoyachi 
70.  to handle the ball - qo`l bilan o`ynamoq 
71.  to head the ball over the bar - to`pni bosh bilan urib darvoza to`ridan oshirib yubormoq 
72.  an inside left (right) - chap (o’ng) tomondagi o’rta hujumchi 
73.  kick-off - to'pni birinchi urish 
74.  left (right) winger - chap (o`ng) qanot hujumchisi 
75.  linesman - liniyadagi sudya 
76.  line-up - jonli devor (to`siq) 
77.  misskick - (to`pni) xato tepish 
78.  muff - lapashang, landovur 
79.  penalty kick - 11 metrlik jarima to`pi 
80.  penalty box - jarima maydonchasi 
81.  point margin - ochkolar nisbatidagi farq 
82.  to score a goal - (darvozaga) to`p kirgizmoq 
83.  referee - sudya 
84.  sign board -tablo 
85.  second division games - quyi liga komandalari o`yini 
86.  soceer -futbol (Angliyada) 64 
87.  to widen the gap -farqni oshirmoq 
88.  to bat the ball - to`pni yerga urmoq 
89.  to bar - to`smoq 
90.  to block - o`yinchini ushlamoq 
91.  to cut into the zone - raqib zonasiga shiddat bilan kirmoq 
92.  to dribble the ball - to`pni yerga urib oldinga yurmoq 
93.  to drop (throw in, shoot) basket - to`pni savatga tashlamoq, otmoq 
94.  to draw (to pull) the opponent - raqibni o`ziga jalb qilmoq 
95.  personal (technical) foul - shaxsiy xato 
96.  to put the ball in play - to`pni o`yinga kiritmoq 
97.  to strike the ball out - to`pni raqibning qo`lidan urib olmoq 
98.  to team up - komandadoshiga yordam bermoq 
99.  to drop the ball - to`pni qo`lga kiritmoq 
100.  spiker - to`pni kuchli zarb bilan uradigan o`yinchi (volebol)

messages.from: Online English lessons and Japanese language
messages.author: Temurbek Sobirov
text:
1.  What sports society do you belong to? - Siz qaysi sport jamiyatiga a`zosiz? 
2.  How the winter sports season is in full swing. - Hozir qishki sport mavsumi avjida. 
3.  The compitition will be opened with the long-distance run.- Musobaqa uzoq masofaga yugurish bilan ochiladi. 
4.  A tournament - turnir 
5.  a gymnastic compitition - Gimnastika bo`yicha musobaqa 
6.  an International contest - Xalqaro musobaqa 
7.  The national team . - Mamlakat terma komandasi 
8.  a contestant - musobaqa qatnashchisi 
9.  to qualify for the finals - finalga chiqmoq 
10.  semi-finals - yarim final 
11.  The world high-jump record holder. - yuqoriga sakrash bo`yicha dunyo chempioni 
12.  Honourable Master of Sports - Xizmat ko`rsatgan sport masteri 
13.  A medal winner - medal sovrindori 
14.  a triple champion - uch karra chempion 
15.  to win the championship - birinchilikni qo`lga kiritmoq 
16.  to compete for the first place birinchi o`rin uchun musobaqalashmoq 
17.  to surprise defeat - tasodify yengilish (mag`lubiyat) 
18.  to try to even up - hisobni tenglashtirishga harakat qilmoq 
19.  A trainer (coach) - mashq qildiruvchi, o`rgatuvchi 
20.  What team do you root to? - Siz qaysi komanda ishqibozisiz? 67 
21.  The audience gave the English team a hearty welcome. - Tomoshabinlar Angliya komandasini yaxshi kutib oldilar. 
22.  In whose favour is the goal? - Gol kimning foydasiga? 
23.  What is the score? - Hisob necha (qanday)? 
24.  The score is 2:0 (two-nill). - Hisob 2:0. 
25.  The score was 3:3 draw - Hisob 3:3, durang 
26.  to open the score - hisobni ochmoq 
27.  a baton - estafeta tayoqchasi 
28.  to race in the 100 metres - 100 metrga yugurishga qatnashmoq 
29.  to take the lead - oldinga chiqib olmoq 
30.  Were you at the boxing match? - Siz boks musobaqasida bo’lganmisiz? 
31.  light weight - yengil vazn 
32.  middle weight - o`rta vazn 
33.  heavy weight - og`ir vazn 
34.  He floored (put him down) in five minutes. - U besh daqiqada uning yelkasini yerga tegizdi. 
35.  Who is the champion in free- style wrestling? - Erkin kurashda kim chempion? 
36.  What`s his own weight? - Uning vazni qancha? 
37.  He turns the scale at (to) 120 kgs. - Uning vazni 120 kg. 
38.  The team started off a fine style. - Komanda o`yinni yaxshi usulda boshladi. 
39.  They opened score in the first 5 minutes. - Ular birinchi 5 minut ichida hisobni ochishdi. 
40.  In the first time the visiting team took the initiative.- Birinchi taymda mehmon komanda tashabbusni o'z qo’liga oldi. 
41.  They were rough. - Ular qo`pol o`ynashdi. 
42.  The skill of both teams was particularly equal. - Ikkala komandaning mahorati teng edi. 
43.  N. is equally good in defence and attack- N.himoyada ham, hujumda ham yaxshi o`ynaydi. 
44.  He is a master in the art of heading. - U to`pni bosh bilan urishga usta. 68 
45.  The referee had to give an extra time. - Hakim qo`shimcha vaqt berishga majbur bo`ldi. 
46.  to go in for sports - sport bilan shug`ullanmoq 
47.  to be keen on - qiziqmoq, shug`ullanmoq 
48.  to play versus - qarshi o`ynamoq 
49.  in favour of - foydasiga

32.  middle weight - o`rta vazn 
33.  heavy weight - og`ir vazn 
34.  He floored (put him down) in five minutes. - U besh daqiqada uning yelkasini yerga tegizdi. 
35.  Who is the champion in free- style wrestling? - Erkin kurashda kim chempion? 
36.  What`s his own weight? - Uning vazni qancha? 
37.  He turns the scale at (to) 120 kgs. - Uning vazni 120 kg. 
38.  The team started off a fine style. - Komanda o`yinni yaxshi usulda boshladi. 
39.  They opened score in the first 5 minutes. - Ular birinchi 5 minut ichida hisobni ochishdi. 
40.  In the first time the visiting team took the initiative.- Birinchi taymda mehmon komanda tashabbusni o'z qo’liga oldi. 
41.  They were rough. - Ular qo`pol o`ynashdi. 
42.  The skill of both teams was particularly equal. - Ikkala komandaning mahorati teng edi. 
43.  N. is equally good in defence and attack- N.himoyada ham, hujumda ham yaxshi o`ynaydi. 
44.  He is a master in the art of heading. - U to`pni bosh bilan urishga usta. 68 
45.  The referee had to give an extra time. - Hakim qo`shimcha vaqt berishga majbur bo`ldi. 
46.  to go in for sports - sport bilan shug`ullanmoq 
47.  to be keen on - qiziqmoq, shug`ullanmoq 
48.  to play versus - qarshi o`ynamoq 
49.  in favour of - foydasiga

🔰 Join and share with your friends!👇🏻

✔️

text.text:
🗓 1 август (2005 йил)

📋 “Ўзбекистон Республикасида ўлим жазосини бекор қилиш тўғрисида”ги

text:
бошлаб, ўлим жазоси бекор қилиниб, унинг ўрнига умрбод ёки узоқ муддатга озодликдан маҳрум қилиш жазоси жорий этилган.

📌 Ўша пайтдаги қонунчиликка мувофиқ икки турдаги жиноят яъни, жавобгарликни оғирлаштирадиган ҳолатларда қасддан одам ўлдириш ва терроризм жиноятларини содир этганлик учун ўлим жазоси назарда тутилган эди.

Каналга уланиш👇👇👇

messages.from: Online English lessons and Japanese language
messages.author: Temurbek Sobirov
text:
Ha, bugun 1-avgust bo‘lishiga qaramasdan poytaxt ko‘chalari bum-bo‘sh, xuddi kinolardagi tashlab ketilgan shaharga o‘xshaydi. 

Lekin 4-5 yil oldin 1-avgust bunaqa emas edi. Bu kunga alohida tayyorgarlik ko‘rilar edi. Taksistlar yo‘lkira narxini besh-olti barobarga oshirib olishar edi. 

Yil bo‘yi birov ishi ham bo‘lmagan etikdo‘zning ishi yurishib ketar edi🤣, uning vazifasi shippakning ichiga imkon boricha ustalik va butun san’atini ishga solib o‘ta mohirona telefonni joylashtirish edi. Odamlar sal qolsa etikdo‘zning qabuliga yozilish uchun navbatga turishar edi. 

Zangiotada chala mullalar va lo‘lilarning ishi-ku, imtihondan bir hafta oldin boshlanib ketar edi🤦🏻‍♂.

text.text:
- Ha, qayoqqa ketyapsan? 
- Zangiotaga borib bir duo olib kelaylik.
- O‘qish-chi? 
- O‘qish to‘xtab turadi, Zangiota ruhlarini shod qilmasak, o‘qishga kirolmas ekanmiz.
“Eng katta o‘qishlarga kirib keting, imtihonda savollar oson tushsin, ko‘zingizni yumib ishlab chiqing

text:
” shunga o‘xshash 😂

Milisiya amakilar ham aynan shu kuni ishni qilib qolishar edi, hatto milisiyalargacha x-variant sotishar edi, ular ham ertalabdan o‘lja izlab ko‘chaga chiqqan yirtqichdek harakat qilishar edi. 

Kimdir bunkerga kirib ketgan, kimdir x-variant izlagan, ota-onalar, bobo-momolar abituriyentlardan ko‘ra ko‘proq harakat qilishar edi. 

Kimdir esa o‘sha chekka bir qishlog‘idan faqat bilimigagina ishonib kelgan va o‘sha

Ishqilib 1-avgust universitet farroshigacha pul qiladigan kun edi. Korrupsiya miqyosini tasavvur qilyapsizmi? Lo‘ligacha “leviy” qiladigan tizim yo‘q bo‘ldi. 

To‘liq yo‘q bo‘ldi deb ayta olmayman, chunki hali DTM va Davlat qabul komissiyasining boshida o‘zgarishni xohlamaydigan, har qanday yangilikni o‘zlariga dushman deb biladigan “dinozavr”lar bor ekan, bu tizim hali ham kimlargadir katta daromad manbai bo‘lib qolaveradi.

text.text: Bugun 1-avgust - hech qanday kun. Uyda o‘tir. Pandemiya. Karantin.”

text: Sizda ham bugungi kun bilan bog‘liq xotiralar bo‘lsa
Yozilgan izohlarni o‘qib kayfiyatingiz ko‘tarilishi shubhasiz!😉

Bugun 1-avgust - hech qanday kun. Uyda o‘tir. Pandemiya. Karantin.”
Sizda ham bugungi kun bilan bog‘liq xotiralar bo‘lsa
Yozilgan izohlarni o‘qib kayfiyatingiz ko‘tarilishi shubhasiz!😉

text:
Фейсбук ва Инстаграмни блоклаш Ўзбекистон иқтсодиёти учун кунига 1500000 $ га тушмоқда.

Хабарингиз бор, айни пайтда Ўзбекистонда Фаcебоок ижтимоий тармоғига кириш чекланган. Одамларнинг кўпчилиги 2018 йилда ўргангани каби VPN хизматидан фойдаланяпти. Маълумотларга кўра Фаcебоок ва Инстаграмъни блоклаш Ўзбекистон иқтсодиёти учун кунига 1 миллион 500 минг долларга тушмоқда.

Ижтимоий тармоқларни блоклашдан Ўзбекистонга нима наф? Изох ўзингиздан!

text:
"Go" fe'li so'z birikmalari

go abroad - chet elga chiqish
go astray - adashib qolish
go bad - buzulib qolish, aynib qolish
go bald - kal bo'lish
go bankrupt - bankrot bo'lish
go blind - ko'r bo'lish / sezmay qolish
go crazy - jinni bo'lish
go dark - qorong'ulashish
go deaf - kar bo'lish
go fishing - baliq ovlash
go mad - jahli chiqish
go missing - yo'qolish
go on foot - piyoda yurish
go online - aloqaga chiqish
go overseas - okeandan o'tish
go quiet - jim bo'lib qolish
go sailing - suzish / qayiqda suzish
go to war - urush boshlash
go yellow - sariq bo'lish

text.text: Aniq artikl bilan ishlatiladigan turg'un birikmalar

text:
✳️ Quyidagi birikmalar ingliz tilida aniq artikl bilan ishlatiladi:

✅ all the same - baribir, qaramasdan  
✅ keep the house - uyni boshqarmoq
✅ by the time - borib, -guncha
✅ lay the table - dasturxon yozmoq
✅ by the way - aytgancha 
✅ on the contrary - aksincha
✅ make the bed - yotoqni yig'ishtirmoq
✅ do the bed - yotoqni tayyorlamoq  
✅ do the cooking - ovqat tayyorlamoq  
✅ do the washing up - idishlarni yuvmoq
✅ on the whole - umuman olganda
✅ tell the time - vaqtni aytmoq
✅ tell the truth - haqiqatni aytmoq
✅ do the shopping - bozor qilmoq
✅ for the sake of - sharafiga 
✅ the same - bir xil
✅ for the time being - hozircha 
✅ the right side - toʻg’ri yoʻlda/tarafda
✅ the wrong side - notoʻg’ri yoʻlda/tarafda
✅ under the influence of - ta’sirida, ta’siri ostida
✅ under the impression - taassurot ostida
✅ in the distance - uzoqda 
✅ in the daytime - kunduzi
✅ in the end - oxiri, niyohat 
✅ in the long run - borib-borib, oxirida  
✅ in the sun - quyoshda
✅ in the dark - qorong’uda
✅ in the shade - soyada
✅ in the rain - yomg’ir ostida
✅ in the meantime - hozirda
✅ in the past - oʻtmishda
✅ in the original - o'z tilida 
✅ on the phone - telefonda
✅ in the face of - biror sharoitga qaramasdan, natijasida

text.text:
​​Ava Max - "So Am I"

Do you ever feel like a misfit?
Everything inside you is dark and twisted
Oh, but it's okay to be different
'Cause baby, so am I (so am I, so am I, so am I-I-I-I-I)

Can you hear the whispers all across the room?
You feel her eyes all over you like cheap perfume
You're beautiful, but misunderstood
So why you tryna be just like the neighborhood?

I can see ya, I know what you're feelin'
So let me tell you 'bout my little secret
I'm a little crazy underneath this
Underneath this

Do you ever feel like a misfit?
Everything inside you is dark and twisted
Oh, but it's okay to be different
'Cause baby, so am I (so am I, so am I, so am I)
Do you ever feel like an outcast?
You don't have to fit into the format
Oh, but it's okay to be different
'Cause baby, so am I (so am I, so am I, so am I-I-I-I-I)

Oh so, dressed so fancy like Sid and Nancy (Yeah)
Walkin' Killer Queen, gotta keep 'em guessin'
So baby come pass me a lighter
We're gonna leave 'em on fire
We're the sinners and the blessings

I can see ya, I know what you're feelin'
So let me tell you 'bout my little secret
I'm a little crazy underneath this

text:
Muloqot uchun yangi iboralar. 

 Catch me later — Keyinroq gaplashamiz

 Clear the way! — Yo'lni bo'shating

 Come back anytime — Xohlagan paytda yana tashrif buyuring

 Come right in — Kirib o'ting

 Could I call you later? — Keyinroq qo'ng'iroq qilsam maylimi?

 Could I join you? — Sizga qo'shilsam bo'ladimi?

 Don't push (me)! — Menga bunday gapirmang! 

 Enjoy your meal! — Yoqimli ishtaha

 Guess what! — Nimaligini toping!

 I doubt that. - Shubhalanayapman

 I had a lovely time — Vaqtimni yaxshi o'tkazdim

 I spoke too soon — O'ylamay gapirib yuboribman

 Keep in touch. — Aloqada bo'lib turing

 Leave it to me. - Buni menga qo'yib bering

 Make it two. — Menga ham qo'shib oling ( asosan kafelarda )

 No can do. — Buni qila olmayman

 No way! — Hechamda ! 

 Pull up a chair. — Bizga qo'shiling.

text_entities.text:
Muloqot uchun yangi iboralar. 

 Catch me later — Keyinroq gaplashamiz

 Clear the way! — Yo'lni bo'shating

 Come back anytime — Xohlagan paytda yana tashrif buyuring

 Come right in — Kirib o'ting

 Could I call you later? — Keyinroq qo'ng'iroq qilsam maylimi?

 Could I join you? — Sizga qo'shilsam bo'ladimi?

 Don't push (me)! — Menga bunday gapirmang! 

 Enjoy your meal! — Yoqimli ishtaha

 Guess what! — Nimaligini toping!

 I doubt that. - Shubhalanayapman

 I had a lovely time — Vaqtimni yaxshi o'tkazdim

 I spoke too soon — O'ylamay gapirib yuboribman

 Keep in touch. — Aloqada bo'lib turing

 Leave it to me. - Buni menga qo'yib bering

 Make it two. — Menga ham qo'shib oling ( asosan kafelarda )

 No can do. — Buni qila olmayman

 No way! — Hechamda !

messages.from: Online English lessons and Japanese language
messages.author: Temurbek Sobirov
text:
⚡️Асаларичилар коронавирусга чалинмаяпти?!

Aсалари заҳри таркибида Covid-19 га қарши қандайдир модда борлиги аниқланди❗️

2020-йилнинг апрел ойи охирида "Токсикон" журнали Хитойдаги тадқиқотларга асосланиб, вирус энг кўп тарқалган Ухан ҳудудида ҳам ҳалигача бирорта ҳам асаларичи Covid-19 га чалинмагани ҳақидаги хабарни эълон қилди. 

Aсаларичиларни текширишнинг илк натижаларига кўра хитойлик шифокорлар асалари заҳрига қарши иммунитетнинг коронавирус инфекциясига қарши ҳимоя тизими бўла олади, деган тахминни илгари суряпти.

Лекин бу асосланмаган. Ишониб хам юборманглар!

Каналга обуна бўлинг👇

messages.from: Online English lessons and Japanese language
messages.author: Temurbek Sobirov
text:
​​Қуйидаги парча Фитратнинг 1914 йилда ёзган "Оила" асаридан иқтибос:

"Мамлакатимиздаги хотинлар ҳар дақиқада қанчадан-қанча таҳқир ва жафоларга дучор бўлиб яшамоқдалар. Биз туркистонликлар ўз хотинларимизни одамият доирасидан ташқарисида деб ўйлаймиз ва у бечораларга одамга қилгандек муомала қилмаймиз. Кўп ҳолатда, ҳайвонларнинг ҳолига юрагимиз ачишади. Аммо аёлларнинг паришон ҳолларига мурувватимиз етмайди. Хотинларимизни марҳаматга сазовор, инсофга лойиқ ва шафқатга ҳақли деб билмаймиз. Бизда хотинларни сўкиш фахр ва ғурур саналади, уриб майиб қилишни эса эркакчиликнинг фазилати деб биламиз. Оллоҳ аёлни фақат шаҳвоний орзуларимиз ва ҳайвоний эҳтиросларимизни босиш учун яратган деб ўйлаймиз...

Улар ҳақиқатда ҳам башариат фазилатларининг аксаридан маҳрум қолганлар. Саодат майли ва тараққий орзуси уларнинг қалбидан тамоман чиққан. Шижоат ва жасорат батамом йўқ бўлиб, табиатларидан танбаллик ва заифлик жой олган. Иззат талаби, шараф ҳифзи, ҳуқуқларини ҳимоя этиш фикрларини тушунтириб берганда ҳам тушунмайдилар. Муҳокима, таамим тафаккурни батамом тарк қилиб бир машинага ўхшаб эрларининг ишоратига тобе бўлиб қолганлар. Хулоса қилиб айтганда, бахтсизлигимиз ва қолоқлигимизнинг энг муҳим сабаблари ҳам шундадир".


Каналга уланинг: 👉

messages.from: Online English lessons and Japanese language
messages.author: Temurbek Sobirov
text:
O‘qish, mutolaaning foydalari

1. Vasvasa, g‘am-anduhlarni haydaydi.

2. Nohaqlikka tushishdan uzoq bo‘ladi.

3. Bekorchilardan yiroq bo‘ladi.

4. Til burro bo‘ladi, kalom mashqini oladi, ohang qilib so‘zlamaydi, balog‘at, fasohatga zeb bermaydi.

5. Aql rivojlanadi, zehn yangilanadi, xotira kuchayadi.

6. Bilimga boy bo‘lib, yodlash, tushunchasi ko‘p bo‘ladi.

7. Insonlar tajribalarini, ulug‘lar hikmatlarini, ulamolar kashfiyotlarini o‘zlashtiradi.

8. Ilmiy malakasini oshiradi, hayot haqidagi madaniy onggini oshiradi.

9. Iymoni ziyoda bo‘ladi xususan Islom dini haqidagi kitoblarni o‘qiganda. Zero, kitob eng buyuk nasihatchi, yomonliklardan qaytarguvchi va yaxshi ishlarga buyurguvchidir.

10. Zehn parishonligidan, qalb bo‘linishidan, vaqt zoe' bo‘lishidan panoh topadi.

11. So‘zni puxta tushunadi, ifoda uslubini, iboraning maqsadini, jumla tushunchasini, hikmat sirlarini anglaydi.

I'd rather be anywhere
Anywhere but here
I'd rather be anywhere
Anywhere but here
I close my eyes and see a crowd of a thousand tears
I pray to God I didn't waste all my good years
All my good years
All my good years

The voices screaming loud as hell
We don't care 'bout no one else
Nothing in the world could bring us down
Now we're so high among the stars without a worry
And neither one, one of us wants to say we're sorry

Anywhere but here

What the hell were we fighting for?

That we're too numb and just too dumb to change the story
